articles.title: Vitamin B12 deficiency: The sign of low levels you’re more likely to notice ‘at night’ - Express
articles.description: Vitamin B12 becomes pernicious if left to its own devices for too long, so addressing warning signs is of great importance. Failure to do so may result in life-altering complications such as neurological damage and death.

articles.title: Heart attack: How often you go to the toilet daily signals risk of 'future' heart attack - Express
articles.description: A HEART attack is a sudden and shocking event that often strikes when you're least expecting it. However, research does suggest the frequency of your daily bowel movements can predict your 'future' risk of a heart attack.
